code: import React from'react';import AppIcon from'./AppIcon';import{apps}from'../appsConfig';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AppGrid(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4",children:apps.map(app=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppIcon,{name:app.name,icon:app.icon,color:app.color,onClick:()=>window.open(app.url,'_self')},app.id))});}export default AppGrid;
